name: Pulsus
description:
Now available for download on Windows! Available in English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Русский, & Nederlands!

Pulsus is a rhythm game for PC in which you hit incoming beats on a 3x3 tile board! The game's levels are made by the community and users can create accounts and upload their own, as well as being able to save their scores and see how they compare to other players worldwide through level leaderboards and Pulse gained from good performance. The game can be downloaded and played via itch.io or played in your browser at https://pulsus.cf/play (though the executable is preferred and also has Discord Rich Presence support!) You can also join the community by joining the Discord, which can be found in-game or at https://discord.gg/B77pTZp.
